TextLibrary.Text: Flicker
Elistara
We did it! My people are free! Well most of them...
We did it! My people are free! Well most of them...
We did it! My people are free! Well most of them...
We did it! My people are free! Well most of them...
Are your parents here, Flicker?
Are your parents here, Flicker?
Are your parents here, Flicker?
Are your parents here, Flicker?
No. My father was slain when I was only a hatchling, but my mother should have been here. Still I won't give up hope.
No. My father was slain when I was only a hatchling, but my mother should have been here. Still I won't give up hope.
No. My father was slain when I was only a hatchling, but my mother should have been here. Still I won't give up hope.
No. My father was slain when I was only a hatchling, but my mother should have been here. Still I won't give up hope.
Perhaps she is being held prisoner somewhere else. We will look until we find her.
Perhaps she is being held prisoner somewhere else. We will look until we find her.
Perhaps she is being held prisoner somewhere else. We will look until we find her.
Perhaps she is being held prisoner somewhere else. We will look until we find her.
Thank you. Elistara, I have a question for you. Please be honest with me.
Thank you. Elistara, I have a question for you. Please be honest with me.
Thank you. Elistara, I have a question for you. Please be honest with me.
Thank you. Elistara, I have a question for you. Please be honest with me.
Of course.
Of course.
Of course.
Of course.
When all this is over, would you take me as your new mount?
When all this is over, would you take me as your new mount?
When all this is over, would you take me as your new mount?
When all this is over, would you take me as your new mount?
I would like nothing better.
I would like nothing better.
I would like nothing better.
I would like nothing better.
